column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType

#Text=Main Asami Sato Bolin Bumi Hou - Ting Jinora Kai Korra Mako Tenzin Yin Antagonists Dai Li Gombo 's gang P'Li says : " Minor Chow Desna and Eska Gun Monorail conductor Oogi Naga Pabu Royal Palace servants San Tonraq Tu Upper - class men White Lotus sentries Zuko " Tarrlok says : " Although the Hundred Year War has long passed , we are not living in a time of peace .
#Text=They just want to wage war against benders .
#Text=Chief Beifong was supposed to protect Republic City , but she was powerless to stop Amon 's attack on the arena .
#Text=She has failed us all .
#Text=If we are to survive these dire times , our law enforcement needs new leadership .
#Text=" Mako says : " I still ca n't believe they 're shutting this place down .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yeah .
#Text=We had some good memories here , did n't we ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Guys !
#Text=Great news .
#Text=You do n't have to go back on the streets .
#Text=I talked to Tenzin and made all the arrangements .
#Text=You can come live on Air Temple Island with me !
#Text=" Mako says : " Oh , we 'd love to , but ... " Bolin says : " Asami already invited us to live in her dad 's giant mansion !
#Text=From here on out , it 's gon na be the lap of luxury for us .
#Text=" Asami says : " Oh hey , Korra , I was hoping you would stop by .
#Text=" Korra says : " I was just leaving .
#Text=So , I guess I 'll see you guys around , some time .
#Text=" Asami says : " Why not tomorrow ?
#Text=I 'd love to have you come visit the estate .
#Text=" Korra says : " I do n't know .
#Text=I have some ... Avatar stuff to do .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Come on , Korra .
#Text=We all deserve a little rest and relaxation after all this craziness .
#Text=We could swim in Asami 's pool .
#Text=It 'll be fun !
#Text=" Korra says : " All right , Pabu .
#Text=" Asami says : " Great , we 'll see you tomorrow .
#Text="
